item.title: [j22] Instruments of War
item.description:
Artifact

Flash

As Instruments of War enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.

Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.

item.title: [j22] Spellstutter Sprite
item.description:
Creature — Faerie Wizard

Flash

Flying

When Spellstutter Sprite enters the battlefield, counter target spell with mana value X or less, where X is the number of Faeries you control.

item.title: [j22] "Synchronous Dismissal"
item.description:
Instant

This spell costs {2} less to cast if you control two or more creatures that share a creature type.

Put target nonland permanent into its owner's library second from the top.

item.title: [j22] "See the Soul"
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}.

• Draw two cards.

item.title: [j22] Typhoid Rats
item.description:
Creature — Rat

Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

item.title: [j22] Crypt Rats
item.description:
Creature — Rat

{X}: Crypt Rats deals X damage to each creature and each player. Spend only black mana on X.

item.title: [j22] Burglar Rat
item.description:
Creature — Rat

When Burglar Rat enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.

item.title: [j22] Ulcerate
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. You lose 3 life.

item.title: [j22] Sinuous Vermin
item.description:
Creature — Rat Horror

{3}{B}{B}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

As long as Sinuous Vermin is monstrous, it has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

item.title: [j22] Eviscerate
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy target creature.

item.title: [j22] Chittering Rats
item.description:
Creature — Rat

When Chittering Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent puts a card from their hand on top of their library.

item.title: [j22] Nezumi Bone-Reader
item.description:
Creature — Rat Shaman

{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player discards a card. Activate only as a sorcery.

item.title: [j22] Ogre Slumlord
item.description:
Creature — Ogre Rogue

Whenever another nontoken creature dies, you may create a 1/1 black Rat creature token.

Rats you control have deathtouch.

item.title: [j22] Ashcoat of the Shadow Swarm
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Rat Warlock

Whenever Ashcoat of the Shadow Swarm attacks or blocks, other Rats you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Rats you control.

At the beginning of your end step, you may mill four cards. If you do, return up to two Rat creature cards from your graveyard to your hand. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

item.title: [sld] Mountain
item.description:
Basic Land — Mountain

({T}: Add {R}.)

item.title: [bro] Fauna Shaman
item.description:
Creature — Elf Shaman

{G}, {T}, Discard a creature card: Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [bro] Gwenna, Eyes of Gaea
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elf Druid Scout

{T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells or activate abilities of a creature or creature card.

Whenever you cast a creature spell with power 5 or greater, put a +1/+1 counter on Gwenna, Eyes of Gaea and untap it.

item.title: [bro] Teething Wurmlet
item.description:
Creature — Wurm

Teething Wurmlet has deathtouch as long as you control three or more artifacts.

Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life. If this is the first time this ability has resolved this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Teething Wurmlet.

item.title: [bro] Titania's Command
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose two —

• Exile target player's graveyard. You gain 1 life for each card exiled this way.

• Search your library for up to two land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

• Create two 2/2 green Bear creature tokens.

• Put two +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.

item.title: [bro] Perennial Behemoth
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Beast

You may play lands from your graveyard.

Unearth {G}{G} ({G}{G}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [bro] Rootwire Amalgam
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Golem

Prototype {1}{G} — 2/3 (You may cast this spell with different mana cost, color, and size. It keeps its abilities and types.)

{3}{G}{G}, Sacrifice Rootwire Amalgam: Create an X/X colorless Golem artifact creature token, where X is three times Rootwire Amalgam's power. It gains haste until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
